next_steps.note: "Brainstorm potential themes or subjects for the poetry (e.g., nature, love, loss, social commentary). Add 3-5 to the 'Ideas' list.",
"Research contemporary poets and poetry styles to identify potential inspiration. Document 2-3 poets/styles in 'Ideas'.",
"Draft a first poem â€“ aim for a short, free-verse piece, focusing on imagery. Add '[Draft 1 - Title]' to 'Progress' once completed.",
"Define a project scope. How many poems will this project encompass? Add this number to 'Ideas'.",
"Create a 'Revision Notes' section within the board to capture feedback and ideas for improvement on draft poems."
